name: symbiosis

effect.sun-moon: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

short_effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
